body.p:
Overlay linking done for the Xtensa manager is similar to how it is done for the PMC manager, with the following differences:
No more overlay table or overlay data created in DDR

li.p: No more rodata section in D-RAM for overlays
Old tables for PMC manager are no longer used, now only the table _ovly_table is used along with a overlay stubs table which creates function stubs needed by the overlay manager

body.p: Another important change to this process is that updateLinkerScripts.pl now updates two new files: declOvl.h and systemConfig.h. The file declOvl.h is updated with the Xtensa overlay declaration macros as well as the macros necessary for defining overlays. systemConfig.h is updated with a macro that will enable the PMC overlay manager when it is defined, and enable the Xtensa manager when it is undefined. Refer to for greater details on linking overlays.
